Subject: DMCA


OFFICIAL DMCA NOTICE 

NOTICE of COPYRIGHT/TRADEMARK INFRINGEMENT 

Complainant Name : Walter Scott

Address : 15 Wingfield Drive

City:  DERBY

Country: UNITED KINGDOM

Phone : +44 1332 672 179

This Notice is served on: http://www.seducedgrannies.com As the

http://www.theplanet.com As the offending domains host 



This copyrighted material is currently being infringed at the following

http://www.seducedgrannies.com/tgp.shtml

I request that the foregoing material and/or activity be removed or
access to it disabled. 

http://www.seducedgrannies.com and the following URL's. 

http://www.seducedgrannies.com/tgp.shtml

And all pages that follow the last two URL's 

 

THIS NOTICE IS PER THE DIGITAL MILLENNIUM COPYRIGHT ACT of 1998 

As the owners of the exclusive right to the copyrighted material at

I hereby state, under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United

exclusive right that is being infringed as set out in this notification.


Walter Scott
